name: Rave
description:
Welcome! Here you are looking at Rave! Download and enjoy it! I know you will.

I have plans to add a 2-Player mode. with a new HUD but that is in the works. I will need to refine the idea.

Please support the developer!

IF YOU GET A FILE NAMED "crash", PLEASE IGNORE IT!

UPDATELOG:

1.0 Ported from 3Rave, added a new enemy, P to pause and new difficulty settings!

1.1 Added new Highscores in options. Not yet encrypted, or fully refined, please report all bugs in the Discussion Board
